availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Breckinridge County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Served as a member of the Senate of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1857-1861 and 1865-1869.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge, District 1, p. 111. Lewis Collins and Richard H. Collins, Collins' Historical Sketches of Kentucky, vol. 2 (Covington, KY: Collins & Co., 1878), 96. Find A Grave, "John B. Bruner (1825-1876)," Memorial #33933100, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=33933100&ref=acom (accessed August, 3, 2017).
